name: Geefest-Tactics
description:
Geekfest Tactics

Created for the Geekfest Game Jam 2022

Cosplay Strategy Game

Customise your crew of 5 with different outfits, and battle in 4 different realms

  • Anime
  • Manga
  • Video Game
  • Comic

Simple Controls

Left-click to select a unit, then choose their target. Blue squares indicates where you can move, red is where you can attack.

Right-click (or press empty space) to cancel movement

Once all your units have moved, it's the opponent's turn. Defeat all foes to win!

Single Player Campaign

Clear a map in one realm to unlock another map. There are 5 maps in all for each area.

Multiplayer

If you've cleared the single-player campaign, or are just up for a challenge,  try playing multiplayer.

There are 4 different multiplayer maps, and they are much larger than normal!

Multiplayer maps give your units 6 movement, instead of the regular 3.

They also have Fog-of-War enabled. You won't be able to see your opponents units unless you move within 2 spaces of them.
